refnamediv.refpurpose: Return current UNIX timestamp with microseconds

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the string "msec sec" where sec is the current time measured in the number of seconds since the Unix Epoch (0:00:00 January 1, 1970 GMT), and msec is the microseconds part. This function is only available on operating systems that support the gettimeofday() system call.
